task_id.description: A unique identifier automatically generated for this task.

workflow_id.description: The identifier of the overarching workflow object (M task directives : 1 workflow).

cluster_locations.description: The HTCondor pool(s) where the taskforce(s) will run.

task_image.description: The Docker/Singularity/Apptainer image to run for each event. Apptainer images in directory (sandbox) format will start fastest; other formats will first be converted to this format on each worker CPU.

task_args.description: The argument string to pass to the task image.

timestamp.description: The epoch time when this task was created.

input_queues.description: The message queue(s) that this task will use for event input.

output_queues.description: The message queue(s) that this task will use for event output.
